gameDetails.name: The Others: 7 Sins â€“ Beta Team Expansion
gameDetails.description:
The Beta Team Expansion box will include the stretch goals NOT exclusive of the Kickstarter campaign.

The full contents of the Beta Team box are:

- 5 Heroes, featuring Freder, Elle, Kanga, Polly, and Will; 
- 12 Upgrade Cards, featuring 6 new cards; 
- 3 Hero Dice;
- 5 Old Town Tiles, including a Maps Leaflet;
- 6 Corrupted Police Acolyte Miniatures, featuring 3 different sculpts and their Acolyte Board;
- 6 Corrupted Fireman Acolyte Miniatures, featuring 3 different sculpts and their Acolyte Board.
